mapper.select: SELECT EMP.EMP_NUM, EMP.EMP_NAME, EMP.EMP_NAME_ENG, EMP.EMP_PCTR_FILE, R.RANK_NAME, D.DEPT_NAME FROM EMP INNER JOIN APNTM A ON EMP.EMP_NUM = A.EMP_NUM INNER JOIN RANK R ON A.RANK_NUM = R.RANK_NUM INNER JOIN DEPT D ON A.DEPT_NUM = D.DEPT_NUM WHERE EMP.EMP_NUM = #{sEmpNum} AND A.START_DATE <= SYSDATE AND A.END_DATE IS NULL AND A.STS_NUM = '1' AND D.DEL_CHECK = '1'

SELECT SQ.APNTM_DVSN_NUM, TO_CHAR(SQ.START_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS START_DATE, TO_CHAR(SQ.END_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS END_DATE, CASE WHEN SQ.NEWEST = '1' AND SQ.OLDEST = '1' THEN '0' WHEN SQ.NEWEST = '1' AND SQ.OLDEST != '1' THEN '1' WHEN SQ.NEWEST != '1' AND SQ.OLDEST = '1' THEN '-1' END AS DATE_TYPE FROM ( SELECT E.EMP_NUM, E.HIRE_TYPE, E.PRBTN_CHECK, A.APNTM_DVSN_NUM, A.START_DATE, A.END_DATE, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY START_DATE DESC) AS NEWEST, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY START_DATE ASC) AS OLDEST FROM EMP E INNER JOIN APNTM A ON E.EMP_NUM = A.EMP_NUM WHERE E.EMP_NUM = #{sEmpNum} AND A.STS_NUM = '1' ) SQ WHERE SQ.NEWEST = '1' OR SQ.OLDEST = '1'
SELECT B.BANK_NAME, SA.ACNT_NUM, SA.DPSTR FROM SLRY_ACNT SA INNER JOIN BANK B ON SA.BANK_NUM = B.BANK_NUM WHERE SA.EMP_NUM = #{sEmpNum}

SELECT EDCTN_LEVEL_NUM, SCHL_NAME, TO_CHAR(ADMSN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ADMSN_DATE, TO_CHAR(GRDTN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS GRDTN_DATE, GRADE, SCHL_REGSTR_DVSN FROM EDCTN_LEVEL WHERE EMP_NUM = #{sEmpNum} ORDER BY ADMSN_DATE DESC
SELECT CMPNY_NAME, TO_CHAR(JOIN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS JOIN_DATE, TO_CHAR(RSGNT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS RSGNT_DATE, DEPT, PSTN, JOB FROM CR WHERE EMP_NUM = #{sEmpNum} ORDER BY JOIN_DATE DESC

SELECT LCNS_NAME, TO_CHAR(ACQRMNT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ACQRMNT_DATE, ISSUE_ORGNZT, ACQRMNT_SCORE, TO_CHAR(EXPRTN_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS EXPRTN_DATE FROM LCNS WHERE EMP_NUM = #{sEmpNum} ORDER BY ACQRMNT_DATE DESC
